pre_caption: This video presents a wide scenery shot from a first-person perspective, positioned just above the water level. Initially, the bottom half of the frame is occupied by water, which extends from the foreground to the middle ground. A platform with a railing is visible in the right foreground. In the middle ground, two brightly lit windows are on the left side of the frame, and a dark, arched doorway is centered. The camera then moves steadily forward through the water, causing the platform on the right to exit the frame. As the camera advances, the central archway becomes larger and moves from the middle ground to the foreground, while the windows on the left shift toward the periphery of the frame.
